author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed the tag doclet so that the build can now generate reasonable documentation for all the current tag libraries as part of the maven build.

Some javadoc tags like

and don't quite get converted to XML unfortunately but its getting close.
Also the documentation doesn't handle derivation or importing of tags into other taglibs yet.
